data.title: Good Community Helpful People
data.text:
I have not had any of their crawfish, yet, but I intend to.  My friend called me from the Woodlands last night and she wanted me to find out how she could help donate to those most affected by the flooding in Louisiana. She had see that their location was accepting items to take to Louisiana (it was reported on KTRK ABC 13)  I was so impressed with Matt Rhymer, he explained to me that they had just filled a truck and sent it off to Louisiana. this is the kind of business people we need in Pearland! He actually shut down his own business to help those in need.  What a kind spirit. 
He will be accepting any cleaning supplies, mops, brooms, buckets, etc all through the weekend. Please support this selfless endeavor and then support his business the rest of the year. May God bless him and May God comfort for those in Louisiana that have lost so much.

data.title: the name changed but still a great boil!!
data.text: the place is simple, its a walk up window and when in season the crawfish is excellent.  its a little pricey (standard for seafood).  they do a great boil.. if you love crawfish this is a great little place... it may not look like much from the street, but quality is worth every penny.  never get many dead crawfish and sizes are good.  i have been here many times and maybe found 12 bad ones out of many many pounds of orders.

data.title: Great crawfish
data.text: The seasoning that they use is amazing!!  They were fast, had enough on hand and were reasonably priced.  We used to boil up the crawfish ourselves, but have now found our new go to place to buy crawfish.

data.title: Half the bag was dead
data.text: After arriving home we saw that the bag consisted of half dead crawfish. The love ones were miniature. Ugh. We tried calling for hours. No answer. Can you say a waste of time. Will not go back. I'd rather drive the 40 minutes to Rosie's in seabrook

data.title: Awesome Crawfish and great prices.
data.text: Awesome crawfish and great price. The kids that work there are nice and proffesional. There is a line fo get your crawfish sometimes but well worth the wait. Cant say enough good things about this place.

data.title: Mudbugs time
data.text: This place is really great for dem mudbugs, they are well packaged and steaming hot to take home. The corn and potatoes are extra but they are worth buying for the whole crawfish effect.

data.title: Awesome Delicious Boiled Crawfish!! (Carry out only)
data.text: Just purchase 6lbs of boiled crawfish. They were delicious! Fresh, juicy, a nice size and seasoned just perfectly. Way to go La crawfish!!!. I was going to buy 3lbs but the young man working there said that they were real good and I took his advice and bought more. I am very glad that I did.  Thank you DJ!!!!. Will see you guys real soon!!!

data.title: Great Live Crawfish
data.text: These folks are very nice and I've been buying live crawfish from them for three seasons. I usually buy anywhere from 40 -100 lbs at a time time and they are always good.
